solution_line_template: Keith's dog ate half of his collection so he had {multiplier_for_half} * {cards_left} cards = <<{multiplier_for_half}*{cards_left}={cards_before_dog_ate}>>{cards_before_dog_ate} cards before his dog ate them.

Keith had added {new_cards_added} new cards to his collection so he had {cards_before_dog_ate} cards - {new_cards_added} = <<{cards_before_dog_ate}-{new_cards_added}={initial_cards}>>{initial_cards} cards to start with.
